author: admin
title: Wenger Corporation Launches New Websites
text:
Submitted by admin on 9/29/2015 @ 8:04 AM   Wenger Corporation 
OWATONNA, Minn. -- (BUSINESS WIRE) -- Wenger Corporation recently launched new websites for its three core markets – music education, performing arts and athletics – so customers can find information more easily and to fully present Wenger’s diverse capabilities. These dynamic websites are accessible from the portal website www.wengercorp.com and feature mobile-friendly design. 
On each new market website, pages are optimized for simplicity, readability and printability. Supporting product information like sales literature, specifications, how-to videos and case studies is featured, along with installation and product photos. Other resources include informative planning guides and multiple options for communicating with sales personnel. 
“As we get ready to mark our 70 th anniversary next year, we’re improving our customers’ experience by organizing and streamlining our web presence,” said Chris Simpson, President and CEO of Wenger. “From our roots in music education, our company has expanded to also flourish in the performing arts and athletic markets. These new sites better serve our customers by better reflecting our company’s evolution and future.” 
About Wenger Corporation 
Wenger Corporation provides innovative, high-quality products and solutions for performing arts, music and theatre education, and athletic equipment storage and transport. For almost 70 years Wenger has been listening to what our customers need and then designing and manufacturing innovative, durable and functional products to meet those needs. Founded in 1885, J.R. Clancy designs and manufactures high-quality rigging and theatrical equipment. For more information on J.R. Clancy, please call 1-800-836-1885 or visit www.jrclancy.com . 
For more information on Wenger, please call 1-800-4WENGER or visit www.wengercorp.com . View source version on businesswire.com: http://www.businesswire.com/news/home/20150929006410/en/ Copyright © Business Wire 2015
